name: Revhub
description: We are a decentralized investment fund that uses M.I.A - Market Intelligence Automator, a cutting-edge bot designed to execute profitable leverage trades in the crypto market. As our decentralized investment fund expands, M.I.A will evolve in tandem, reflecting our team's commitment to innovation. Holders will get revenue shared based on the amount of tokens they holding. Participating in team based decisions on how to and when to invest in other projects. This brings the decentralized investment fund to the level web3 is designed for. More information will be disclosed on the next steps we are going to take at the same time our ecosystem grows.
